Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Grook Fu, the ancient Hozen art of bashing heads with a stick.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Ichor of Undeath
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Summon 2 friendly minions that died this game.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Kabal Songstealer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arakkoa has a golden frog in his hand!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Knuckles
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: After this attacks a\nminion, it also hits the enemy hero.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: When confronted with accusations of performance-enhancing bananas, Knuckles replied, "I get my fruit from trees I knock down with my bare hands like everyone else."

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Lotus Agents
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Discover a Druid, Rogue, or Shaman card.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Mostly, they stand around and look cool.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Lotus Assassin
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Stealth. Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain Stealth.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: For 5000g, you can just give the Jade Lotus any name and they will assassinate and/or embarrass them.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Lunar Visions
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Draw 2 cards. Minions drawn cost (2) less.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The true mystery of lunar visions is how there is nothing to watch when there are so many channels.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Piranha Launcher
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: A great improvement over the guppy launcher.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Raza the Chained
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x] Battlecry: If your deck has \nno duplicates, your Hero\n Power costs (1) this game.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Red Mana Wyrm
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Whenever  you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: It has double the Attack.  "Go on."  And double the Health.  "Yes??"  And its trigger has twice the effect.  "WHAT???"  And it costs…  Five times more.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Second-Rate Bruiser
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Taunt Costs (2) less if your opponent has at least three minions.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: He'll be a first-rate bruiser once he gets used to his contacts.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Shadow Oil
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Add 2 random Demons to your hand.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Spiked Hogrider
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: If an enemy minion has Taunt, gain_Charge.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Did you know the Hogchoppers compete every year at the Mirage Raceway?  They do.  It's a real group.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Streetwise Investigator
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "Hmmmm…  Call it a hunch, but I'm starting to think that there may be some kind of criminal activity going on in Gadgetzan."

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Virmen Sensei
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: There is no carrot.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: White Eyes
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Shuffle\n'The Storm Guardian' into your deck.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: My life for Aya!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Ancient of Blossoms
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: His new shampoo is really working!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Aya Blackpaw
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Though young, Aya took over as the leader of Jade Lotus through her charisma and strategic acumen when her predecessor was accidentally crushed by a jade golem.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Big-Time Racketeer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "It'd be a shame if someone disenchanted those Legendaries."

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Defias Cleaner
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: His house cleaning service is quite thorough.  Not a spot to be found... or any of your stuff!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Dragonfire Potion
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Felfire Potion
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Fight Promoter
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na minion with 6 or more\n_Health, draw two cards.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "Yeah, I can get you Knuckles.  No, no, he's been clean for *weeks*."

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Jade Behemoth
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Kabal Crystal Runner
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Costs (2) less for each Secret you've played this_game.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Kabal Trafficker
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nadd a random Demon\nto your hand.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Leatherclad Hogleader
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand, gain Charge.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The Hogchoppers, the terrors of Tanaris, can always be found at one tavern or another in Gadgetzan, refueling for totally real and legit adventures that they go on.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Luckydo Buccaneer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: If your weapon has at least 3 Attack, gain +4/+4.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: You can't just leave a Luckydo somewhere.  You gotta keep 'em with you!  Especially in Gadgetzan!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Madam Goya
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Swap it with a minion in your deck.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: She has set up her Black Market here in Gadgetzan for one purpose, to make a KILLING when Beanie Babies make their inevitable comeback.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Wind-up Burglebot
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Whenever this attacks a minion and survives, draw_a card.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Don't blame the bot for his crimes...  Blame whoever keeps winding him up!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Wrathion
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Draw cards until you draw one that isn't a Dragon.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon.  Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask?  WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Abyssal Enforcer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other characters.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Don Han'Cho
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +5/+5.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The brilliant mastermind of the Grimy Goons, Han sometimes thinks about ditching the idiot Cho, but that would just tear him apart.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Greater Arcane Missiles
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Shoot three missiles at random enemies that deal $3 damage each.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Grimestreet Protector
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Some new asphalt should do the trick.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Inkmaster Solia
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, the next spell you cast this turn costs (0).
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Jade Chieftain
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Krul the Unshackled
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has\nno duplicates, summon all\n_Demons from your hand._
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Mayor Noggenfogger
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: This flavor text was randomly generated.  If it happens to form words and make sense, that is purely by chance.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Ichor of Undeath
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Summon 3 friendly minions that died this game.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Kun the Forgotten King
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Choose One - Gain 10 Armor; or Refresh your Mana Crystals.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Aya siphons a bit of Kun's soul to animate each golem in her Jade army. To his credit, he's being a great sport about it.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Shadow Oil
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Add 3 random Demons to your hand.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Corrupting Mist
Journey to Un'Goro.text: At the start of the corrupting player's turn, destroy this minion.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Dark Power
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Your next spell costs Health instead of Mana.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Liquid Membrane
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Invocation of Air
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Invocation of Fire
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deal 6 damage to the enemy hero.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Liquid Membrane
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Adaptation
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Air Elemental
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Makes a mean puff pastry.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Awaken the Makers
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Quest: Summon\n7 Deathrattle minions.\nReward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Binding Heal
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Restore #5 Health to a minion and your hero.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Crystalline Oracle
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card\nfrom your opponent's deck\n_and add it to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Earthen Scales
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Emerald Hive Queen
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: She rules the emerald hive at the end of the yellow brick trail.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Emerald Reaver
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Not to be confused with clubbing enthusiast Emerald Raver.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Fire Fly
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Archnemeses: small children with glass jars.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Fire Plume's Heart
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Glacial Shard
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Ice, ice, baby!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Hallucination
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It's the good kind of hallucination.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Iron Hide
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Jeweled Macaw
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Jungle Giants
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Summon 5 minions with 5 or more Attack. Reward: Barnabus.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Lakkari Sacrifice
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Lost in the Jungle
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: George and Karl were never heard from again.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Molten Blade
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Open the Waygate
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Cast 6 spells that\ndidn't start in your deck.\nReward: Time Warp.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Raptor Hatchling
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a 4/3 Raptor into your deck.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: They’re just baby teeth. Lots and lots of baby teeth.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Stampede
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Each time you play a Beast this turn, add_a_random Beast to_your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: The Caverns Below
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Play five minions\nwith the same name.\nReward: Crystal Core.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

Journey to Un'Goro.name: The Last Kaleidosaur
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: The Marsh Queen
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 15 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Unite the Murlocs
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Form feet and legs!  Form arms and body!  Oh.  Sorry.  I was thinking about Mechafin.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Arcanologist
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Biteweed
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other card you've played this turn.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: AKA Edwin VanLeaf.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Bloodbloom
Journey to Un'Goro.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Help save mana.  Donate blood today!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Clutchmother Zavas
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Whenever you discard this, give it +2/+2 and return it to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: A bit of a snob: still refuses to drive anything with automatic transmission.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Cornered Sentry
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: The Draenei are seriously considering cancelling "Bring Your Murderous Pet to Work Day."

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Corrupting Mist
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Corrupt every minion. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: The most terrifying of Un’goro magics is both silent… AND deadly.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Crackling Razormaw
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Wasn't clever enough to go AROUND the electric fence.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: DIE, INSECT!
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Hero Power\nDeal $8 damage to a random enemy.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Dinomancy
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Give a Beast +2/+2.'
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Anyone can dinomance. Just put your lips together and RAAWWWAARGGGH.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Explore Un'Goro
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Replace your deck with_copies of "Discover a card."
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It turns out cards DO grow on trees!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Fire Plume Harbinger
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand_by (1).
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Good for summoning elementals. Great for making s'mores.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Flame Geyser
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deal $2 damage.\nAdd a 1/2 Elemental to_your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Golakka Crawler
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Universally adored by both control decks and ninjas.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Grievous Bite
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and $1 damage to adjacent ones.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Ooh.  I'll have a bite of this, and of this, and of this...

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Hydrologist
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Murloc hydrologists are pretty rare.  Most murloc undergrads pick computer science.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Primalfin Champion
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Return any spells you cast on this minion to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Sure, he'll return your stuff.  OVER HIS DEAD BODY!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Primalfin Totem
Journey to Un'Goro.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Murloc.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Emits a sound only murlocs can hear, which is good because it’s REALLY annoying.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Primordial Glyph
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Pyros
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Return this to_your hand as a 6/6 that costs (6).
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: If you strike her down, she shall become more powerful than you can possibly… well, she'll become a 6/6 anyways.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Radiant Elemental
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It's a literal lava lamp!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Ravasaur Runt
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: If you control at_least 2 other minions, Adapt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Doesn't like to adapt unless others are watching. Some minions are such show-offs.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Razorpetal Lasher
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a\nRazorpetal to your hand\nthat deals 1 damage.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: The reason why there are no zombies in Un'goro.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Razorpetal Volley
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Add two Razorpetals to_your hand that deal_1 damage.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Rockpool Hunter
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Loves crab meat. Fears crabs.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Shadow Visions
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: This one’s a bird. And here’s a bunny!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Shimmering Tempest
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: HATES being summoned for Kirin Tor party lighting.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Stubborn Gastropod
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Stubbornly pursuing its dream to become Azeroth's fastest animal!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tortollan Forager
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Add a random minion with 5 or more Attack to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: In the Tortollan tongue, Un’goro is known as the “Land of the Lost and Found.”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Un'Goro Pack
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Add 5 Journey to Un'Goro cards to your hand.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Volatile Elemental
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Currently in an anger management class with Raging Worgen, Grommash Hellscream, and The Angry Chicken. It isn't helping.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Chittering Tunneler
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Deal damage to your hero equal to its Cost.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Ear to the ground, he carefully interpreted the chittering noises: “You wanna cast a spell? I wanna cast a spell!”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Curious Glimmerroot
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one started in your opponent's deck to get a copy of it.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: George promised to be good. But it's easy for little Glimmerroots to forget.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Devilsaur Egg
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: A key ingredient in all discerning Funnel Cake recipes.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Eggnapper
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Often misunderstood, it's just that he likes to use the eggs as pillows.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Elder Longneck
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with 5 or more Attack, Adapt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: And so the bartender says, “Why the long neck?”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Envenom Weapon
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Like Deadly Poison, but deadlier.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Giant Wasp
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Float like a butterfly, sting like a giant wasp!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Gluttonous Ooze
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and gain Armor equal to its Attack.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Three time winner of the Un'Goro weapon eating contest.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Hot Spring Guardian
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: NONE SHALL PASS until at least an hour after eating.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Humongous Razorleaf
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Loves goblins.  In a light cream sauce.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Igneous Elemental
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/2 Elementals to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: We wanted to name him "Ingenious Elemental", but he just wasn't that bright.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Mana Bind
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Nice spell.  YOINK!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Mimic Pod
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Draw a card, then add a copy of it to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Jinx!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Mirage Caller
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Mirage is actually the name of its long-lost cat.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Primalfin Lookout
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, Discover a_Murloc.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Lookout is a self-appointed title that's mostly an excuse to beat things up.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Pterrordax Hatchling
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Aww.  So cute.  Want to feed him another finger?

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Spirit Echo
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Return _this to your hand."
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: I guess you can say they’re… “soul survivors.”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Stonehill Defender
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Briefly tried stand-up comedy under the name "Stonehill Offender", but turtles are just too thin-skinned.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Sulfuras
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 8_damage to a random enemy.'

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tar Creeper
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Terrorscale Stalker
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Likes to scare his friends half to death.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Thunder Lizard
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, Adapt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: What? THUNDER LIZARD is adapting!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Vicious Fledgling

[x]After you cast a spell on
this minion, summon a
1/1 Plant and cast
another copy on it.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: The Lich King
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, add a random Death Knight card to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "All that I am: anger, cruelty, vengeance, 8 attack - I bestow upon you, my chosen knight."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Frost Lich Jaina
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Arthas was a spoiled child, playing with toys he could neither control nor understand. Come into the cold. I will show you the true power of the Frozen Throne."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Hadronox

Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The viziers of Azjol-Nerub released Hadronox as a last-ditch effort to hold back the Lich King. They did so by VERY carefully scooping him up in a LARGE newspaper and releasing him.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Obsidian Statue
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal\nDeathrattle: Destroy a\n random enemy minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/3 Lifesteal weapon.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Step forward. Confess! Once I was a mere servant of the Light. Now I alone stand in judgement."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Army of the Dead

Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Unidentified Maul
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Void Ripper
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Swap the\nAttack and Health of all_other_minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: You had to put the portable hole inside the bag of holding, didn't you?!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Wand of Disintegration
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Silence and destroy all enemy minions.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Wax Rager
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Resummon this minion.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Wondrous Wand
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Draw 3 cards. Reduce their Costs to (0).

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Zarog's Crown
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Discover a Legendary minion. Summon two copies of it.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Zola the Gorgon
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Her name seems a bit cheesy.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Amethyst Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Lifesteal. Deal $5 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Astral Tiger
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a\n copy of this minion into_your_deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Astral kitty litter is surprisingly hard to find.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Branching Paths
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Choose Twice - Draw a\ncard; Give your minions \n+1 Attack; Gain 6 Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Three paths diverged in a darkened hall, and I –\nI took the one less traveled by,\nAnd got eaten by a slime.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Call to Arms
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Recruit 3 minions that\n cost (2) or less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: More personal than a text to arms.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Cataclysm
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Destroy all minions. Discard your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Cursed Disciple
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/1 Revenant.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Politer than his brother, the cursing disciple, but far more evil.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Darkness Candle
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Snuff out a candle. Draw a card.\nCast this when drawn.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dr. Boom's Boombox
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Summon 7 'Boom Bots'.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Duskbreaker
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Ebon Dragonsmith
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random weapon in your hand by (2).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Having a furnace-mouth is really handy for a blacksmith.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Elven Minstrel
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Combo: Draw 2 minions from your deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Fal'dorei Strider
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your deck. When drawn, summon a 4/4 Spider.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Flanking Strike
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Greater Amethyst Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Lifesteal. Deal $7 damage to a minion.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Guardian Spirit
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Hoarding Dragon
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Give your opponent two Coins.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Keeps his two cents to himself.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Hooked Reaver
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or_less Health, gain +3/+3_and Taunt.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Ironwood Golem
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt\nCan only attack if you have 3 or more Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Marketed as a "rust-proof iron golem."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Illusionist
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 copy of a minion from your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: He can make ANYTHING look like a candle.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Monk
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero_Powers.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: There is no candle.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
A purple stone Azari carved
For dark hearts, craving, power-starved.
The first to bow, the warlock Rin,
Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Leyline Manipulator
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Oaken Summons
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Gain 6 Armor.\nRecruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Primordial Wand
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Adapt a friendly minion {0} |4(time, times).

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Reverberating Ooze
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After this minion\nsurvives damage, summon a copy of this minion.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Shimmering Courser
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Only you can target\nthis with spells and\nHero Powers.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: A courser is a courser of course, of course, she's more of a unicorn than a horse...

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Shroom Brewer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Restore 4_Health.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Side effects guaranteed!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Shroomsayer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After this minion\nsurvives damage,\ndestroy all minions.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Sneaky Devil
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Stealth\nYour other minions have +1 Attack.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The result of a tragic accident involving a Defias Thug, a Wand of Polymorph, and a bundle of Fel Lotus.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Spider Ambush!
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon a 4/4 Spider. Draw a card.\nCast this when drawn.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: The Darkness
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Starts dormant. Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Candles into the enemy deck. When drawn, this awakens.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: I would rather light a single candle than curse the darkness. But I'm willing to do both.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Twig of the World Tree
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Gain 10 Mana Crystals.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: For druids who want to branch out.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Arcane Tyrant
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Tyrant is such a strong word.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Carnivorous Cube
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Destroy\na friendly minion.\nDeathrattle: Summon 2 copies of it.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: He's always grumpy until he's eaten his first barista of the morning.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Corrosive Sludge
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The result of centuries of terrible sanitation.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Deck of Wonders
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dispel Ward
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Hero Power\nSilence your minions.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Doors Are Closing
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Hero Power\nEnd the game.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragon's Fury
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all_minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Emerald Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon three 3/3_Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Fungalmancer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2/+2.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Fungalmancy is the easy major for those who can't cut it at Waxmancy.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Furbolg Mossbinder
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a 6/6_Elemental.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Behold, the unstoppable power of MOSS!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Greater Emerald Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon four 3/3_Wolves.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Greater Onyx Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Destroy up to 3 random enemy minions.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Green Jelly
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/2 Ooze with_Taunt.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: This card really breaks out of the mold.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Guild Recruiter
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The original telemarketer.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: King's Ransom
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Swap decks with your_opponent.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon two 3/3_Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
An emerald stone for Tauren hands
Who sought its strength to save their lands
Their tribes now lost, their rage released
Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: (Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
The trolls of old embraced the gift
A jewel of black for daggers swift
No party lasts who finds the stone
Those wielding it soon stand alone.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Level Up!
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and_Taunt.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Ding!\n\nGrats.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Possessed Lackey
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Recruit a_Demon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Scroll of Wonder
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Cast a random spell. Draw a card.\nCast this when drawn.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Skull of the Man'ari
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Don't trust the skull.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: The Final Seal
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Summon a 6/6 Demon.\nAdd 'Azari, the Devourer'\nto your hand.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: The First Seal
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon a 2/2 Demon. Add 'The Second Seal' to your hand.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: The Fourth Seal
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon a 5/5 Demon. Add 'The Final Seal'\nto your hand.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: The Second Seal
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon a 3/3 Demon. Add 'The Third Seal'\nto your hand.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: The Third Seal
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon a 4/4 Demon. Add 'The Fourth Seal' to your hand.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Trogg Gloomeater
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt\nPoisonous
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Windshear Stormcaller
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you control all 4 basic Totems, summon Al'Akir_the_Windlord.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Don't ever doubt Al'Akir's love for basic totems.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Aluneth
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Crystal Lion
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Divine Shield\nCosts (1) less for each Silver\nHand Recruit you control.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Gather Your Party
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Recruit a minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional!  Who’s with me?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Gemstudded Golem
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt\nCan only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Perfectly accessorized to attract adventurers.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Grumble, Worldshaker
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Return your other minions to your hand. They cost (1).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The grumbling grew to a mighty rumbling, and out of the caverns the kobolds came tumbling.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Guardian Spirit
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Hungry Ettin
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion for your opponent.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: How can he be hungry… if he's Ettin!?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Rin, the First Disciple
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Runed Shield
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nSummon a 5/5 Golem.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Seeping Oozeling
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle of a random minion in your deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Uh, you might want to get that looked at.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Serrated Shield
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nDeal $5 damage.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Spiked Shield
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nEquip a 5/2 weapon.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Spiteful Summoner
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Battlecry: Reveal a spell from your deck. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Sometimes she'll summon a Doomsayer. Out of spite.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: To My Side!
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Summon an Animal\nCompanion, or 2 if your\ndeck has no minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: I hunt alone.  Well, me and Misha.  And Huffer.  And Leokk.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Tower Shield +10
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nGain 10 more Armor.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Unidentified Shield
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nGains a bonus effect in_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Val'anyr
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Corridor Creeper
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Costs (1) less whenever a minion dies while this is_in_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: It likes the smell of dead things, which is curious, as it has no visible nose.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Crushing Walls
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "It could be worse!" "It's worse."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Greater Diamond Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Resurrect 4 different friendly minions.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Greater Mithril Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon three 5/5 Mithril Golems.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Greater Sapphire Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon 3 copies of a friendly minion.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: (Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
A diamond, white, this stone the eighth
A precious jewel for those of faith
A whispered prayer restores the lost
But none among them know the cost.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
To dwarves of stone the demon called
With promises of might, enthralled
In grasping greed they found their doom
Forever bound in mithril tombs.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Sapphire Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: (Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
A stone of blue, embraced with glee
By murloc lords beneath the sea
Soon numberless they swarmed the shore
First two, then four, then more...and more...

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Battlecry: Cast each spell\nyou cast on your minions\n this game on this one.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Mithril Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon two 5/5 Mithril Golems. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Psychic Scream
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Everybody! Hit the deck!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Rhok'delar
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no minions, fill your_hand with Hunter_spells.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Rhok'delar is ready to Rhok'de'casbah!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Shifting Hourglass
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Take an extra turn. Costs (1) less for each Boss you've defeated this run.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Silver Vanguard
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Recruit an\n8-Cost minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Float like a Faerie Dragon, sting like a Hivequeen.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Temporus
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Geosculptor Yip
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with_Cost_equal_to_your Armor (up to 10).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Grand Archivist
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell from your deck (targets chosen randomly).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Qualifications: Found pointy hat.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Grizzled Guardian
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Recruit 2_minions that cost (4)_or_less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Favorite sandwich? Grizzled cheese.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kathrena Winterwisp
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Recruit a Beast.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: King Togwaggle
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Battlecry: Swap decks with your opponent. Give them a Ransom spell to swap back.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Management of the Kobold Empire requires a careful balance between a lack of social services and fiscal irresponsibility.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Marin the Fox
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/8 Treasure Chest for your opponent. (Break it for awesome loot!)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: My name is Marin the Fox. You took my treasure. Prepare to die.
Kobolds & Catacombs.howToGet: Unlocked by opening a Kobolds & Catacombs pack.
Kobolds & Catacombs.howToGetGold: Unlocked with the BlizzCon 2017 virtual ticket.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: The Runespear
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell\nand cast it with random targets.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Violet Wurm
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Summon seven 1/1 Grubs.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: It's wurms all the way down.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Woecleaver
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragoncaller Alanna
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragonhatcher
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, Recruit a Dragon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Which came first?  The dragon or the dragonhatcher?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Master Oakheart
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Recruit a 1, 2, and 3-Attack minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: His adventuring party consists of Goldshire Footman, Frostwolf Grunt and Hadronox.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Sleepy Dragon
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Voidlord
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Taunt\n Deathrattle: Summon three\n1/3 Demons with Taunt.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Never let it hold your checkbook.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Azari, the Devourer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's deck.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Rod of Roasting
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Cast 'Pyroblast' randomly until a_hero_dies.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Stolen Time
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Hero Power\nDestroy 3 of your Mana_Crystals.\nTake an extra turn.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Wish
